cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4...3.18)
set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)
if (POLICY CMP0025)
  cmake_policy(SET CMP0025 NEW)
endif ()

project(pydyns)
add_subdirectory(pybind11)
include_directories(../include)
include_directories(../include/fparser)
include_directories(../include/eigen-3.3.9)
include_directories(../include/igl)
pybind11_add_module(pydyns ../DynamicSystem.cpp ../DynamicSystem.h ../include/fparser/fparser.cc ../include/fparser/fpoptimizer.cc)
